      • changePassword

        public java.lang.String changePassword(java.lang.String oldPassword,
                                       java.lang.String newPassword,
                                       UserBase admin)
        Attempts to change the password of the current user. If the user is not an admin and the old password does not match, then the password is not changed.
        Parameters:
        oldPassword - Original password of the user.
        newPassword - Password to change to.
        admin - Administrator user.
        Returns:
        Result message to print.
